scripts.start: cross-env PORT=8081 NODE_ENV=development npm run start:app
scripts.start:app: concurrently --kill-others "npm run start:renderer" "wait-on http://localhost:8081 && npm run start:main"
scripts.start:renderer: cd renderer && cross-env BROWSER=none npm start
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production && npm run build:renderer && electron-builder
scripts.build:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build:renderer && npm run start:main
